name: CRE
quote: 1 John 4:7-8  Beloved, let us love one another, for love is from God, and whoever loves has been born of God and knows God. Anyone who does not love does not know God, because God is love.

name: English
quote:
"English is a universal language. It's the number one language for music and for communicating with the rest of the world." 
By Enrique Iglesias (Spanish Musician)

name: Kiswahili
quote:
Ukiona viaelea vimeundwa. 
Maana - Chochote kizuri ukionacho kimetafutwa kwa bidii na jasho

name: Mathematics
quote:
"Without mathematics, there's nothing you can do. Everything around you is mathematics. Everything around you is numbers."

Shakuntala Devi

name: Science
quote:
"Science is simply the word we use to describe a method of organizing our curiosity."
Tim Minchin

name: Social Studies
quote:
"It's the little things citizens do. That's what will make the difference. My little thing is planting trees."
Wangari Maathai
